SEARCH
Module org.jandle
Package org.jandle.api.logger

Interface JandleLogger

public interface JandleLogger
Abstraction for logging within the Jandle framework.

JandleLogger allows the framework to remain independent of any specific logging implementation.

Implementations may log to the console, files, external systems, or structured logging backends.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    info(String... messages)
    Logs an informational message.
    default void
    problem(String... messages)
    Logs a problem message without an associated throwable.
    void
    problem(Throwable t, String... messages)
    Logs a problem message with an associated throwable.
    void
    warning(String... messages)
    Logs a warning message indicating a potential problem or unexpected situation.

  • Method Details

    • info

      void info(String... messages)
      Logs an informational message.
      Parameters:
      messages - informational messages to log

    • warning

      void warning(String... messages)
      Logs a warning message indicating a potential problem or unexpected situation.
      Parameters:
      messages - warning messages to log

    • problem

      default void problem(String... messages)
      Logs a problem message without an associated throwable.

      This method delegates to problem(Throwable, String...) with a null throwable.

      Parameters:
      messages - problem-related messages

    • problem

      void problem(Throwable t, String... messages)
      Logs a problem message with an associated throwable.

      Intended for errors, exceptions, and critical failures.

      Parameters:
      t - the throwable associated with the problem (may be null)
      messages - contextual messages to log
